abstract.p: the representation of interconnect functional requirements. This Data includes functional device data specific to an interconnect product. The functional view of Devices which are fabricated as part of the interconnect product fabrication process are included in the functional definition. Discrete physical devices that are embedded are not included. Configuration management information and design change management information is provided.

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of interconnect functional requirements. This Data includes the functional device data specific to an interconnect product. The functional view of Devices that are fabricated as part of the interconnect product fabrication process are included in the functional definition. Discrete physical devices that are embedded are considered to be external to the interconnect product since their internal geometric design patterns are not used as part of the direct realization of the interconnect product. Configuration management information and design change management information is provided.
purpose.example: Printed inductors, printed connectors, embedded passives such as printed capacitors are all considered in this part of ISO 10303 to be fabricated as part of the interconnect substrate since they are based on geometric patters defined in the authoring CAD system.

MOS transistor die are prefabricated and the geometric patterns used in that prefabrication step are not included in the patterns generated in the CAD system defining the layout. During the realization process for the interconnect operations that expose the terminals of the MOS transistors by removing silicon dioxide are considered by this part of ISO 10303 to be equivalent to lead preparation processes in discrete manufacturing at the assembly level and are ignored.
